src:
Bobol Gawang Arsenal, Hati Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain Campur Aduk
01 Nov 2019, 16:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah pengakuan dibuat oleh Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain. Gelandang Liverpool itu mengaku mendapatkan pergolakan batin yang cukup besar saat ia membobol gawang mantan klubnya, Arsenal.
Pada tengah pekan kemarin, Chamberlain dipercaya oleh Klopp untuk menjadi starter. Ia memimpin lini tengah The Reds saat menghadapi Liverpool di babak 16 Besar Carabao Cup.
Laga tersebut berlangsung dengan ketat dan saling serang sejak awal. Pada laga tersebut, Chamberlain berhasil menyumbangkan satu gol untuk Liverpool.
Chamberlain mengaku perasaannya campur aduk saat membuat gol tersebut. "Gol itu adalah gol yang cukup indah," buka Chamberlain yang dikutip Sportsmole.

Baca komentar lengkap sang gelandang di bawah ini.
text:
Arsenal Goalkeeper Break, Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain Heart Mixed
Nov 01 2019, 16:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - An acknowledgment was made by Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain. Liverpool midfielder claimed to get a pretty big inner upheaval when he broke into the goal of his former club, Arsenal.
In the middle of last week, Chamberlain was trusted by Klopp to be a starter. He led the Reds midfield against Liverpool in the last 16 of the Carabao Cup.
The match was held tight and attacked each other from the beginning. In that match, Chamberlain managed to donate one goal for Liverpool.
Chamberlain admitted his mixed feelings when making these goals. "The goal was a pretty beautiful goal," said Chamberlain was quoted by Sportsmole.

Read the midfielder's full comments below.
